column4: while compiling a new kernel i read that i could add modules (ndiswrapper, nvidia) to be included in the compile, what files & where do i need to put them to make sure they're included in the kpkg
I don't honestly know, I recompile ndiswrapper from source myself.  I set the KBUILD environment varible to the headres for the custom kernel
It might be possible, only thing I can think of though is to patch your kernel source tree so it carries the ndiswrapper module.
